resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108661</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108661</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206575</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">DoHistory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">DoHistory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">DoHistory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">DoHistory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">DoHistory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">DoHistory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">DoHistory</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">shows how to piece together fragments of the past and research the lives of ordinary people. It also features an interactive case study built from research conducted for A Midwife's Tale, a book and film based on the 200-year-old diary of midwife/healer Martha Ballard.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zeigt, wie man Fragmente der Vergangenheit 
zusammenstellt und die Leben der normalen Leute erforscht. Sie 
kennzeichnet auch eine interaktive Fallstudie, die von der Forschung 
aufgebaut wird, die für die Geschichte, ein Buch und Film einer 
Hebamme basieren auf dem Tagebuch 200-year-old von midwife/healer 
Martha Ballard geleitet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">montre comment rassembler des fragments du passé 
et rechercher les vies des gens du commun. Il comporte 
également une étude de cas interactive établie de la recherche 
conduite pour le conte, un livre et le film d'une sage-femme basés 
sur l'agenda 200-year-old de midwife/healer Martha Ballard.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mostra como remendar junto os fragmentos do 
passado e pesquisar as vidas de povos ordinários. Caracteriza 
também um estudo de caso interativo construído da pesquisa conduzida
para o tale, um livro e a película de um midwife baseados no diário 
200-year-old de midwife/healer Martha Ballard.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mostra come radunare i frammenti dell'esperienza e
ricercare le vite della gente ordinaria. Egualmente caratterizza
un'inchiesta interattiva sviluppata da ricerca condotta per il 
racconto, un libro e la pellicola dell'ostetrica basati sul diario 
200-year-old di midwife/healer Martha Ballard.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιδεικνύει πώς να συναρμολογήσει τα τεμάχια του 
παρελθόντος και να ερευνήσει τις ζωές των απλών ανθρώπων. 
Χαρακτηρίζει επίσης μια διαλογική περιπτωσιολογική μελέτη 
που χτίζεται από την έρευνα που πραγματοποιείται για την ιστορία 
μιας μαίας, ένα βιβλίο και μια ταινία βασισμένες στο 
200-χρονών ημερολόγιο της μαίας/healer Martha 
Ballard.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">muestra cómo ensamblar los fragmentos del pasado 
e investigar las vidas de gentes normales. También ofrece un 
estudio de caso interactivo construido de la investigación conducida 
para el cuento, un libro y la película de una partera basados en el 
diario 200-year-old de midwife/healer Martha Ballard.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206575</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108661</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/dohistory</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
